HotelElement.Name: Mardi Gras Holiday Resort Gold Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mardi Gras Resort in Broadbeach, you'll be minutes from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre and close to Jupiters Casino. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Broadbeach Mall and Oasis Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in of the guestrooms, featuring kitchens. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and refrigerators.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.
